body:
I ran the following command with the ```commit 63004e3de1473254c3b2a75f1e06afaabdacd7dd (HEAD -> develop, origin/develop, origin/HEAD)``` version of spack:

```spack view symlink ~/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/ binutils```

in order to populate the bin, include, lib, man, and share directories with symbolic links to items associated with the ```binutils``` installation.  This command did not complete successfully.

### Steps to reproduce the issue (and error message)
I did the following on a clean system:

```console
$ git clone git@github.com:spack/spack.git
$ spack install binutils
$ spack -sd view symlink ~/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/ binutils
lib/spack/spack/config.py:630 ==> Reading config file /Users/mcfadden8/spack/etc/spack/defaults/modules.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:630 ==> Reading config file /Users/mcfadden8/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml
lib/spack/llnl/util/lock.py:303 ==> READ LOCK: /Users/mcfadden8/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquiring]
lib/spack/llnl/util/lock.py:303 ==> READ LOCK: /Users/mcfadden8/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Acquired]
lib/spack/spack/config.py:630 ==> Reading config file /Users/mcfadden8/spack/etc/spack/defaults/repos.yaml
lib/spack/llnl/util/lock.py:303 ==> READ LOCK: /Users/mcfadden8/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/lock[0:0] [Released]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/bin/spack", line 54, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 653, in main
    return _invoke_command(command, parser, args, unknown)
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 432, in _invoke_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/view.py", line 213, in view
    exclude=args.exclude)
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/filesystem_view.py", line 214, in add_specs
    if all(map(self.add_standalone, standalones)):
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/filesystem_view.py", line 268, in add_standalone
    self.merge(spec)
  File "/Users/mcfadden8/spack/lib/spack/spack/filesystem_view.py", line 295, in merge
    raise MergeConflictError(conflicts[0])
llnl.util.link_tree.MergeConflictError: Package merge blocked by file: /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir
```

The information I have about the error in the error message is as follows:
``` console
$ ls -la /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir
lrwxr-xr-x  1 mcfadden8  54987  139 Aug 20 17:47 /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir -> /Users/mcfadden8/spack/opt/spack/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/clang-8.1.0-apple/binutils-2.31.1-347cmcghbl2pq4atso6l7peadcxsc5oo/share/info/dir
stat /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir/
16777220 8599259913 -rw-r--r-- 1 mcfadden8 (54987) 0 1804 "Aug 20 17:52:57 2018" "Aug 20 17:46:14 2018" "Aug 20 17:46:14 2018" "Aug 20 17:46:12 2018" 4194304 8 0 /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir/
file /Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir/
/Users/mcfadden8/.bin/darwin-highsierra-x86_64/share/info/dir/: data
```

### Information on your system
``` console
$ uname -a
Darwin odinn.llnl.gov 17.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.7.0: Thu Jun 21 22:53:14 PDT 2018; root:xnu-4570.71.2~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
```

I am running with the packages.yaml and modules.yaml files from the github repository (unmodified).
title: spack view command produces merge blocked by file error for binutils
